reviewText: Unlike a few other people who gave this dvd bad reviews apparently they are looking for something more like from another wrestling dvd promoter this particular dvd was done by real people who actually wrestle. Infact I was trained by one of the guys that are in the dvd and him and I still wrestle. I liked the dvd and hope others do too if you don't well then you don't but maybe keep your opinion to yourself about what you would have done different or whatever. If you think you could do better then I just say step up and give it a try and see what other people think.

This is an amature wrestling effort that is made by real people, NOT BY ACTORS!  If you are expecting something else, buy something else.  If you like real, non-professional wrestling videos staring real amature wrestlers -- consider this one!  It's an interesting, fairly well made (considering $0 budget) video by amature or real people giving it their very amature best.  I LIKED IT!

Buyers remorse does not begin to describe how I am feeling at this moment. The participants of this trash, (...) do not even attempt to entertain; only grapple. The acting between the deputy and the punk rocker is of Saturday evening ----on the front porch quality. They should not have went into the woods to produce this garbage. They should have produced it inside an active volcano. I am not sure what I was expecting. I did not have high expectations. Obviously the producers did  not either. Instead of wrestling in the woods, all of the wrestlers should have been running around the track----fat everywhere. At least a couple of the wrestlers had the good sense to place masks over  their faces. What a shame they didn't put one over the camera lens. This is embarassing. I could always say that I loved wrestling. I cannot say that anymore. And by the way, when I purchase a wrestling tape, I do not intend to watch two rusty, hard, fat men kissing or spanking each other. Good Grief!!!!
